description: ReVanced Extended is a forked version of the original ReVanced Project. With the Extended version, you can get more features not yet introduced in the official project.

title: NewPipe

description: A libre lightweight streaming front-end for Android.

description: ReVanced Extended, created by inotia00, improves on the original YouTube ReVanced with more features and a friendlier UI.

title: Reddit Revanced
author: krvstek
description: Reddit is the most diverse place on the web, where people from all over the world come together to share passions, ideas and experiences.

title: Spotify Revanced
author: krvstek

title: Instafel

description: Instafel provides fast & up-to-date Instagram Alpha experience for everyone!

description: ReVanced Manager is an all-in-one solution for downloading, installing, and managing ReVanced apps and other modded APKs.

title: Next Player
author: anilbeesetti
description: Next Player is an Android native video player written in Kotlin. It provides a simple and easy-to-use interface for users to play videos on their Android devices.

title: Obtainium
author: ImranR98
description: Obtainium allows you to install and update apps directly from their releases pages, and receive notifications when new releases are made available.

title: MicroG-RE
author: WSTxda
description: GmsCore fork for ReVanced with Material 3 Expressive design, enhanced features, and improvements.

title: Proton VPN
author: ProtonVPN
description: Experience true freedom online. Gain unrestricted access to global content, block annoying ads, and safeguard your privacy with a fast and secure VPN.

title: IronFox
author: ironfox-oss
description: Private, secure, user first web browser for Android. https://ironfoxoss.org/

title: Iceraven Browser
author: fork-maintainers
description: Iceraven Browser is a web browser for Android, based on Mozilla's Fenix version of Firefox, GeckoView and Mozilla Android Components.

title: Termux
author: termux
description: Termux - a terminal emulator application for Android OS extendible by variety of packages.

title: Brave Browser
author: brave
description: Block ads. Save data. And get way faster webpages. Just by switching your browser.

title: GMS Core
author: microg
description: microG Services is a FLOSS (Free/Libre Open Source Software) framework to allow applications designed for Google Play Services to run on systems, where Play Services is not available.

title: GPhotos Revanced
author: mentalblank
description: ReVanced Google Photos APK Auto-Builds

title: PPSSPP
author: hrydgard
description: PPSSPP is the original and best PSP emulator for Android. It runs a lot of games, but depending on the power of your device all may not run at full speed.

title: Eden Emulator
author: eden-emulator
description: Eden is an experimental open-source emulator for the Nintendo Switch, built with performance and stability in mind.

title: Citron
author: Citron
description: The most advanced Nintendo Switch emulator. Experience your favorite games on PC with enhanced performance, higher resolutions, and improved frame rates.

title: AniLab
author: AniLabX
description: AniLabX - android app for watching anime/dramas/cartoons and reading manga/comics/light novels.

title: Mihon
author: minhonapp
description: Discover and read manga, webtoons, comics, and more - easier than ever on your Android device.

title: KDE Connect
author: KDE
description: KDE Connect is a Multi-platform app that allows your devices to communicate.

title: F-Droid Store
author: f-droid
description: F-Droid is an installable catalogue of FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) applications for the Android platform.

title: Nekogram
author: Nekogram
description: Open-source third-party Telegram client with not many but useful modifications.

title: Thunderbird
author: thunderbird
description: Access all your messages, calendars, and contacts in one fast app. Filter and organize the way you like. Manage all accounts separately or in a unified inbox.

title: Proton Mail
author: ProtonMail
description: Proton Mail is a free and secure email service that's powered by our community, not surveillance capitalism.

title: Lawnchair Launcher
author: LawnchairLauncher
description: Lawnchair is a supercharged version of the Pixel Launcher you know and love. Being an open-source project, you get all the latest Pixel Launcher features.

title: Winlator
author: brunodev85
description: Winlatoe is an Android application for running Windows applications with Wine and Box86/Box64.

title: VLC Player
author: videolan
description: VLC for Android is a full audio player, with a complete database, an equalizer and filters, playing all weird audio formats.

title: Squawker
author: j-fbriere
description: An open-source privacy oriented Twitter/X client. Privacy: No tracking, with all data local. No ads: Not clogged by multiple ads.

title: Aurora Store
author: whyorean
description: Aurora Store enables you to search and download apps from the official Google Play store. You can check app descriptions, screenshots, updates, reviews, and download the APK directly from Google Play to your device.

title: TOR Browser
author: TheTorProject
description: Tor Browser isolates websites, prevents tracking, hides browsing history, and encrypts traffic three times, allowing access to blocked sites.

title: Cromite
author: uazo
description: Cromite is a Chromium fork based on Bromite with built-in support for ad blocking and an eye for privacy.

title: Bitwarden
author: bitwarden
description: Bitwarden is a freemium open-source password management service that is used to store sensitive information, such as website credentials, in an encrypted vault.

title: CloudStream
author: recloudstream
description: CloudStream is one of the best streaming and downloading apps available for free. It helps users stream their favorite movies, TV shows, anime, sports, live TV, and much more.

title: LocalSend
author: localsend
description: LocalSend is a free, open-source, cross-platform file sharing tool that allows you to share files to nearby devices.

title: Nobook
author: ycngmn
description: Nobook is a lightweight Android application to browse facebook.

title: Xtra
author: crackededed
description: Xtra for Twitch is a Twitch client focused on providing the best viewing and chatting experience on mobile devices.

title: Futo Keyboard
author: futo-org
description: FUTO Keyboard is a private, offline keyboard with features like swipe typing, smart autocorrect, predictive text, and personalization.

title: Florisboard
author: florisboard
description: FlorisBoard is a free and open-source keyboard for Android 8.0+ devices. It aims at being modern, user-friendly and customizable while fully respecting your privacy.

title: NetherSX2
author: Trixarian
description: NetherSX2 is a PlayStation emulator created for the Android operating system. It lets people play games on their smartphones or tablets that are using PS2 system hardware to run PS2 game ROMs.

title: Shizuku
author: RikkaApps
description: Shizuku guides users to run a process, Shizuku server, with root or ADB first. When the app starts, the binder to Shizuku server will also be sent to the app.

title: Obsidian
author: obsidianmd
description: Spark ideas. From personal notes to journaling, knowledge bases, and project management, Obsidian gives you the tools to come up with ideas and organize them.

title: Hail
author: aistra0528
description: Hail is a free app to freeze Android apps, which can disable, hide, or suspend them to save power and reduce RAM usage.

title: AntiSplit M
author: AbdurazaaqMohammed
description: AntiSplit M is an open-source tool designed specifically for Android devices, mainly used to merge split APK files, such as Split APKs, XAPK, and APKM, into a single complete APK file for direct installation.

title: Ad Away
author: AdAway
description: AdAway is a free, open-source ad blocker for Android. It uses system hosts or a VPN to block ads and trackers.

title: Mpv Extended
author: marlboro-advance
description: mpvExtended is a fork of mpv-android, built on the libmpv library. It aims to combine the powerful features of mpv with an easy to use interface and additional features.

title: Metrolist
author: mostafaalagamy
description: Metrolist is an open-source, lightweight client designed to tap into YouTube Music's vast library while stripping away unnecessary features and advertisements.

title: Fossify Gallery
author: FossifyOrg
description: Fossify Gallery is a comprehensive photo and video app designed with privacy in mind. This Android application provides a seamless experience free from ads.

title: Fossify Phone
author: FossifyOrg
description: The Fossify Phone App offers a fluid and responsive mobile interface, enhancing your phone's performance while safeguarding your privacy.

title: Infinity For Reddit+
author: Docile-Alligator
description: Infinity is a beautiful, feature-rich app that offers a smooth Reddit browsing experience. It is completely ad-less; you can browse Reddit without interruptions or distractions. Built by a passionate university student, Infinity is open source.

title: Pixel Play
author: theovilardo
description: PixelPlay is a modern, offline-first music player for Android, built with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. It's designed to provide a beautiful and seamless experience for listening to your local music library.

title: Installer X Revived
author: wxxsfxyzm
description: Looking for a better app installer? Try InstallerX! Many customized Chinese ROMs come with subpar default installers. You can replace them with InstallerX Revived.

title: App Manager
author: MuntashirAkon
description: App Manager is a fully-featured package manager for Android, with features like installing/uninstalling APKs, viewing app info, and creating shortcuts.

title: SD Maid SE
author: d4rken-org
description: SD Maid 2/SE is an app and file manager that specializes in knowing which apps have created specific files on your device.
